Moody's and Fitch say Chile's polarization, social demands persist after constitution voteA vote in Chile to reject a new constitution on Sunday reduced regulatory uncertainty but does not resolve social discontent or political divisions, rating agencies said on Monday. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 22:20:20 GMT CUVNGVSPAJKNVMV5GQLJFT5ZTI https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/moodys-fitch-say-chiles-polarization-social-demands-persist-after-constitution-2023-12-18/Reuters世界美洲
At least 250,000 flee fighting in Sudan's El Gezira state -IOMAt least 250,000 to 300,000 people have fled Sudan's El Gezira state since Dec. 15 as a result of clashes between the Rapid Support Forces and Sudan's army, the International Organization for Migration (IOM) said on Monday. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 22:17:58 GMT LKX2BC4KSBNW7K5HVPFX35FQQI https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/least-250000-flee-fighting-sudans-el-gezira-state-iom-2023-12-18/Reuters世界非洲
Russian diplomats: New EU sanctions show measures against Moscow have failedRussia's diplomatic mission to the European Union said on Monday that new sanctions imposed by the EU showed that punitive measures against Moscow had failed. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 22:15:13 GMT NLD3N7KYLZJETIZCHLODIDORNI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-diplomats-new-eu-sanctions-show-measures-against-moscow-have-failed-2023-12-18/Reuters世界欧洲
Jordan strikes Iran-linked drugs smugglers in southern Syria - sourcesJordan on Monday launched several aerial raids into its northern neighbour Syria against hideouts of Iranian-backed drug smugglers in retaliation against a large-scale smuggling operation, regional intelligence sources said. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 21:46:15 GMT 4HXAEMATVZKEHHTRE25Y3OR7ZE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/jordan-strikes-iran-linked-drugs-smugglers-southern-syria-sources-2023-12-18/Reuters世界中东
IMF governors approve 50% increase in lending resources with no shareholding changesThe International Monetary Fund's governing body has approved a 50% increase in quota resources to be contributed by member countries in proportion to their current IMF shareholding, bringing total quotas to $960 billion, the IMF said on Monday. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 21:04:07 GMT 5BYNITKCSJNAXEZKJBHVLLFTPE https://www.reuters.com/business/finance/imf-governors-approve-50-increase-lending-resources-with-no-shareholding-changes-2023-12-18/Andrea Shalal商业金融
Texas to arrest migrants crossing border illegally under new state lawTexas's governor is expected to sign a law on Monday that will allow state law enforcement to arrest people suspected of crossing the U.S.-Mexico border illegally, giving local officers powers long delegated to the federal government in a move that will likely trigger legal challenges by rights groups. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 19:44:48 GMT UGU6LEOFWVN3FNS7KPVZO2XUTY https://www.reuters.com/world/us/texas-arrest-migrants-crossing-border-illegally-under-new-state-law-2023-12-18/Ted Hesson世界美国
Commercial ship still hijacked off Somali coast - sourcesA commercial vessel hijacked by unknown assailants remains off the coast of Somalia raising fears of further instability for global shipping as attacks escalate in the Red Sea, maritime security sources said on Monday. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 19:05:40 GMT 7H44KRWMNBN27MAE7UOHOM3JSQ https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/commercial-ship-still-hijacked-off-somali-coast-sources-2023-12-18/Jonathan Saul世界非洲
Israel shipping costs rising as lines pull out and Red Sea attacks worsenThe cost of shipping goods to Israel by sea has risen in recent days as some container lines pull out while others impose new surcharges, adding to the country's supply chain pressures amid its war in Gaza, shipping sources said. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 18:52:21 GMT TNBF5OO5XFPA5N4XNLWLWVFFLY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-shipping-costs-rising-lines-pull-out-red-sea-attacks-worsen-2023-12-18/Jonathan Saul世界中东
Seven European countries pledge CO2-free power systems by 2035Seven countries including Germany, the Netherlands and France pledged on Monday to eliminate CO2-emitting power plants from their electricity systems by 2035. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 18:51:10 GMT FPFFGZB5GZJO7GO4ITPKCNVBQI https://www.reuters.com/business/energy/seven-european-countries-pledge-co2-free-power-systems-by-2035-2023-12-18/Kate Abnett商业活力
Gaza grandfather describes killing of his family by Israeli soldiersWhen the Israeli soldiers entered the Gaza school where Yousef Khalil was sleeping near his family, they began shooting indiscriminately, killing nine people including children, he said, pointing to bullet-pocked, bloodstained walls. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 18:25:38 GMT UNHYMDFWK5KG5AUTVZK5FIHYSY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/gaza-grandfather-describes-killing-his-family-by-israeli-soldiers-2023-12-18/Reuters世界中东
Ex-US, NATO officials call on Congress to pass new Ukraine aidMore than 40 former top U.S. and NATO diplomats and defense officials on Monday urged Congress to approve new aid for Ukraine, warning that losing its war with Russia would be disastrous for Ukraine and threaten the security of the United States and its allies. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 18:24:30 GMT 3BJBGFRXNBL75FNT2IYPAZ47EU https://www.reuters.com/world/ex-us-nato-officials-call-congress-pass-new-ukraine-aid-2023-12-18/Reuters世界
